content.rendered:
Recently we wrote about newscast application ICTV Facts for one of the most popular Ukrainian TV channels.

Now it’s time to check out the numbers.

Android application was downloaded by 10,000 Android users, somewhat less by iOS users.  Android app average rating is 4.5, iOS app got 5.0

Nice start and going beyond!

excerpt.rendered: Recently we wrote about newscast application ICTV Facts for one of the most popular Ukrainian TV channels. Now it’s time to check out the numbers….
